mapper.select: SELECT esp.id,esp.create_time,esp.`status`, case when u.actual_name is null then (case when uw.nick_name is null then "" else uw.nick_name end) else u.actual_name end user_name, case when u.headpic is null then (case when u.headpic_real is null then "" else u.headpic_real end) else u.headpic end user_headpic, case when u.company_duties is null then "" else u.company_duties end company_duties FROM idatavc.elegant_service_participate esp left join users u on esp.token = u.uuid left join users_weixin uw on u.ID = uw.user_id where esp.appId = #{appId} and esp.elegant_service_id = #{elegantServiceId} order by create_time desc limit #{startPage},#{pageSize};
